Wave 3 Battle Cards

Backup Bag

  1. Can I use Backup Bag to save a Weapon or Armor that causes itself to be scrapped, such as Grenade Launcher?
    Yes.
  2. Question regarding Backup Bag + Grenade Launcher / Power Punch / RR Disruptor Blade Can I scrap backup bag instead of a weapon?
    Yes!
